Articles.Content: A long time ago, I saw a picture. It was a parody of the "It's goofy time" picture, but instead it featured Whackjob and his computer instead of goofy and his son. However, I cannot find the picture. Can anyone help me find it?

I know the picture you mean and I know where you can find it.

It was posted in the Thread where Whack said, that he melted his PC... almost a year ago IIRC.

Unfortunately i cant find the thread anymore ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I liked it so much, I kept a copy haha!

![1lXen9j.png](http://i.imgur.com/1lXen9j.png)
